author: vmassol
msg: We don't copy the version information in the jar as it has some "." in the name (ex: clover-0.6b.jar) and WebLogic 7.0 has a bug and ignore jars with dots in the name! Will be fixed in a upcoming patch as it has been fixed in WL 6.1 SP3 ... sigh ...
